about_the_game:
[3rd Person / Permadeath / Adventure] Jesus Christ is back... For vengeance. Try to make it through god's obstacles to prove yourself so that you may smite all the heretics.

Earn your wings

WARNING: This game is PRAY TO WIN




Features:
  • Challenge your divine reflexes!
  • Behold, there is no divine SAVE option in this heavenly game!!
  • Prepare for an epic symphony of celestial melodies and devilishly amusing traps!
  • Feel the holy thrill of knowing you can redeem your character after each glorious demise!
  • Navigate through an assortment of heavenly traps designed to test your faith to its limits!
  • Visualize the triumphant ecstasy of conquering these divine obstacles and attaining true salvation!
  • After your first miraculous triumph, why not strive for the ultimate spiritual feat of completing the entire game in one divine endeavor?

name: I Am Jesus Christ:Christ's Revenge Demo

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
